scidoc — Text analyzer for scientific documents¶

This module contains a bunch of functions that helps you analyze scientific documents according to user-configurable rules (handlers).

scidoc.parse_raw(source, typ='txt')[source]¶

parses docuemnts of different formats and returns an NLTK corpus

scidoc.text_analyze(path, handlerconf, doctype)[source]¶

analyzes a file according to rules specified. Displays suggestion in a user-friendly way

Args:
path: path to the document to be analyzed handlerconf: oath to a configfile listing which rules to apply doctype: Type of document. Currently supported: txt/tex
Returns:
None Output is piped to a suitable the function ui_hook
scidoc.ui_hook(output)¶

this will take care of interacting with the user
